Text:
Hold the Alternate Action (default Shift) while choosing building tool
to delete this kind of building instead
While holding the Alternate Action, delete all kinds of buildings instead of just this kind
Some buildings were already in progress or done, are you sure you want to undo the building?
How many Undo building action you can perform in a row

Make the entity panels (the info panels to the right when you select a building) collapsible.
Can only be changed from the Main Menu
Make the collapse state saved globally instead of per save

Show the terrain and buildings that would be destroyed when selecting a Dynamite.
If you have Multi-directional Dynamite mod enabled, this option is not needed and that mod would enable this option always.

- Added 'Copy building' feature. While in the default (Cursor) tool, middle click (mouse 3, rebindable) on a building to quickly switch to that building tool. You can also then hold Shift to delete matching buildings with 'Shift to Delete' function.
- The following features now work in the Map Editor: Recent tool, Collapsible entity panels and the recently added Copy building.
- Fixed disabling idle worker warning from the Mod Settings not working.
- Fixed recent tool hotkey not working.
Add a warning when a worker has no work to do at a workplace
There are workers with nothing to do
